title: Follow the 2016 Interforum Competition !
body:
Hi everybody !

As you maybe know, the Interboard 2016 championship will finally take place on the Summoner's Rift. It is a tournament beetween the 5 board's languages. Each board send a team of active players to fight for the honor of their board.
The competition will start with a single Bo1 group stage, and the 5th team will be eliminated to leave the 4 last teams fighting for the glory !

-----------------------------------------------
#Dates
All dates are GMT +1 (Fr hour, England is GMT +0). If you ask me i'll edit to write the english hours -----> CET hours

Group stage : 23 / 24, 19:30 - 22:30
Playoffs : 30 / 31, 17:30 - 22:30


**Shedule :**
_Group Stage_
France - Germany, 23 Janvier  19:30
Italy - Spain, 23 Janvier 19:30
UK - France, 23 Janvier 20:30
Germany - Italy,  23 Janvier 20:30
UK - Spain, 23 Janvier 21:30
France - Italy, 24 Janvier  19:30
Spain - Germany, 24 Janvier  19:30
Italy - UK, 24 Janvier  20:30
Spain - France, 24 Janvier  20:30
Germany - UK, 24 Janvier  21:30

_Playoffs_
1st vs 4th   -------> Demi-finale 1 Bo3, 30 Janvier 17:30 
2nd vs 3th  -------> Demi-finale 2 Bo3, 30 Janvier 19:30

FINAL IS Bo5 WITH THE 2 SEMIFINALS WINNERS.
---------------------

#Where you can follow it ?

You will be able to follow it with the streamers who will cast their language team and the playoffs.
I'll add the links Friday, and im still looking for an english and an italian caster.

els_pinkward for French, saturday
pinkwardgirls for French, sunday

Www.twitch.tv/rauletevk7 for spanish
www.twitch.tv/chaoticgenius96 for  english.
www.twitch.tv/germanemissaries for german

Here the YT Channel to watch the replays !

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCSEKlXzJVzJpJ9np1okqI_g

------------------------
#Rules of tournament here !
http://canisback.com/tournament/

-----------------
I hope i finally post on the right category, i dont understand italian at all x)
If not, my apologizes.

-----------------------
If you want, you can create an icon for your team, it would be funnier if you could do it :)

replies.body:
I dont know, i'll try windows in english and i'll take what it says to me x)

EDIT : it is Greenwich Mean Time in english, so GMT.

http://wwp.greenwichmeantime.com/

At least i guess GMT and CET are the same xD

Maybe GMT is for Worlds, and CET for Europe.

Ok ^^'

i'll CET just for you ;)

> [{quoted}](name=Heart of Hentai,realm=EUW,application-id=MJVj50Jw,discussion-id=Mu4tVRf6,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-01-18T16:49:39.321+0000)
>
> France/ITA/Ger time isn't CET (CEST)? As u said, gmt for eng.
> I mean, isn't more correct write CET instead of (GMT +1)?

Quanto sei pignolo :P
Se vuoi mettere proprio i puntini sulle i, i nomi dei mesi sono scritti in francese... :P
Bumperino, non trovavo più il thread

I didnt find another moment to tell you, sorry.

Does your team agree to play its semifinal vs France at 17.30 pls ? I asked somebody to tell you, but i dont know if you agree with it. Thank you, and good luck ;)
So i'll take it that you didn't manage to organize a record of to put the game on youtube?

We will put the games on youtube, but we also stream it.

We will put the games after the live streams (streamers will send us their videos).
Can u tell us which channel are you uploading the matches to?

> [{quoted}](name=Saypher,realm=EUW,application-id=MJVj50Jw,discussion-id=Mu4tVRf6,comment-id=000500000000,timestamp=2016-01-24T12:20:54.560+0000)
>
> Can u tell us which channel are you uploading the matches to?

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCSEKlXzJVzJpJ9np1okqI_g i'll upload here, but for the moment there is nothing.

GT Neat : Plat
**MadCorps zLx : Master**
**William NOMIS : Diam**
LegenDragon : Plat
Epic Lulu Fail : Plat
**DearPear : Diam**
Lyyythengineer : Silver
Mr totokar : Bronze
LordOfNether : Silver

scusate ma non c'era una qualche tipo di limitazione per il rank dei partecipanti ?
We cant play with the 3 players at the same time, its also hard to play with the 2 diamonds, so you'll probably see 1 diamond or the master once a time.

Ok, I asked because it was the first thing I noticed while reading the names and ranks.

I've heard that our italian team has had some problems with the composition, following the rules of "rank points", but seems like it will not be a big deal at least :P
I tried to do my best about the ranks to open the competition to everybody.

ITALY :
**ILouD - ~~Gold~~ ~~Bronze~~ Plat**
Lnoobinside - Silver
Xaviness - unranked ex-plat)
**Ste the ripper - ~~Plat~~ Gold**
Darki200 - Gold
Heavenly Yasha - Plat
Dantazzo - Plat
Mytlix - Silver
ubercodlegend200 - Silver

> Edited.
iloud - Plat

Ma io sono Plat T.T

E si scrive ILouD, non Iloud, sono case-sensitive, cazzo!

Edited !

Ok sry ILouD x)
Thank you :DD
Hype!

I want to buy the Italian team icon! :)

I think that the favourite are the Frenchs, anyway ò_ò
Vabbeh perdono a calcio, almeno a lol possono vincere sti francesi :D

Oh my god, i forgot to ask the board to create an icon for their team x) i'll add it.

Thanks for help me to think ^^'
